channel.title: The Project on Unravelling Hogwarts Ties
channel.description: Recent content in The Project on Unravelling Hogwarts Ties

item.title: Data Analysis
item.description: For this project we have based our data collection from the Harry Potter books. We have also used the full characterlist along with aliases from the Harry Potter fandom wiki:

item.title: Dumbledore's Army
item.description: An interesting moment in the Harry Potter books is the formation of Dumbedore’s Army, whicthis event intuitively shouldh from a character perspective forms a lot of bonds between characters that weren’t closely connected before. This means that a large amount of edges should be made, after the formation of the army. As well as this, some of the students also team up with professors and janitors in the form of the Inquisitorial Squad.

item.title: Snape's True Allegiance
item.description: Key moment: Snape reveals his true allegiance

item.title: The Muggle World vs the Wizarding World
item.description: A large part of the Harry Potter story takes place in the Wizarding World. This world has all sorts of amazing creatures and people. However, the Wizarding World is special due to the fact that it is set to take place parallel to our own world. Therefore it is of interest to see how Harry connects with people before the Wizarding World has been established in the books, in contrast to after it has been introduced.
